title: Flag
description: light blue textile with multicolored decorations using beadwork and sequins; flag\'s imagery consists of a copper colored circle, outlined in red, with a geometric diamond symbol in the center; diamond shape is outlined in blue; each corner of the flag is decorated with a symbol; the TR corner has a spade symbol and the TL corner has a heart symbol; written in white inside the circle are the words, \"AIZAN / L. Cedor\".
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
